page.title: 12Ore White Mill(Cheales Mill)
page.content: {The Mill is next door to our {school on The Ridge.Now there is only {a little bit}left.Mr. and Mrs. Cornelius look after the Mill.They are not allowed to pull it down because if they do people won't have anything old to look at. The base of the Mill is a workshop now. Mr. Cornelius and his brother buy old cars,mend them and spray them.Then they sell them .In the workshop there is some paint and some tools.The base of the Mill is an octagon.Each side measures about three metres. We estimated the height to the top of the wall.It was three metres and about four metres to the top of the roof.We think the whole smock mill measured about nine metres{.The Mill was burnt {down on 16th May 1900. We visited the {Mill on 16th May 1985, exactly 85 {years later. By class 7.
